selected_skills.name: read_bar_values_from_chart
selected_skills.purpose: To extract the values of the largest and smallest bars from the bar chart image.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to read the bar values from the chart image data to identify the largest and smallest bar values.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: To calculate the difference between the largest and smallest bar values.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to compute the difference between the largest and smallest bar values extracted from the chart.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer as a floating-point number with one decimal place.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the calculated difference as a floating-point number with one decimal place.
